quest.name: Search and Rescue
journal: Lady Laniaitte is waiting anxiously for something.
Lady Laniaitte tells you a small unit was dispatched to survey Ok' Gundu but has yet to report back. Fearing for their safety, she asks that you scour the area and see what has delayed their return.

You come upon three wayward knights among the ruins of an old building, but as you draw closer, you also find the Vanu that assaulted them. Defeat the Vanu and ensure the safety of Lady Laniaitte's men.
You defeat the Vanu, and the knights appear none the worse for wear. Report to Lady Laniaitte of what transpired.
Lady Laniaitte is relieved to know her knights are safe. As she would tell it, the ruins where you discovered her knights were once home to the Gundu tribe until they were subjugated by the Vundu.

dialogue.name: LANIAITTE
dialogue.text: Three of my men were sent to survey the area around Ok' Gundu earlier this afternoonsometime last nightearly this morning, and I have yet to hear word from them. A routine check shouldn't have taken this long.

dialogue.name: LANIAITTE
dialogue.text: Forename, may I ask you to travel to this location on your map and see what has delayed them? If they've met with trouble, I would be at ease knowing you are there to help them.

dialogue.name: LANIAITTE
dialogue.text: I fear something has happened to them, but I would like to know for certain. Pray travel to Ok' Gundu and see what has become of my men. I've marked the location on your map.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERA01901
dialogue.text: The Vanu, they... They came out of nowhere...

dialogue.name: SOLDIERB01901
dialogue.text: We thought the building abandoned... We were too careless...

dialogue.name: SOLDIERC01901
dialogue.text: Have you come to help us?

dialogue.name: SOLDIERA01901
dialogue.text: We never expected to find Vanu hiding in a desolate, broken building. Thank Halone you were here to help us.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERB01901
dialogue.text: I was sure we were done for.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERC01901
dialogue.text: I have no serious injuries, though it could have been worse if not for you.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERA01901
dialogue.text: No need to worry about us. We'll return to camp soon enough.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERB01901
dialogue.text: Thank you, adventurer. We will return to camp soon as we're able.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERC01901
dialogue.text: If only we had been more careful... I owe you my life, adventurer.

dialogue.name: LANIAITTE
dialogue.text: You've returned safely, thank goodness. Did you find my men? Were they unharmed?

dialogue.name: LANIAITTE
dialogue.text: Oh, thank goodness. That the Vanu would take refuge there is strange indeed. It was once home to the Gundu tribe. They were a peace-loving people, and for a time we maintained favorable relations.

dialogue.name: LANIAITTE
dialogue.text: That is, until the Vundu attacked. Now the Gundu are under the heel of their rule. But let us not dwell on such sorrowful memories of yesterday. Today you have saved my men, and for that, you have my thanks.

obj.n: He Who Would Not Be Denied
